alert.note: Alert for Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 21 at 5:22AM AKST until November 21 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast and Kivalina and Red Dog Dock. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion may occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas along the coast is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds will decrease slowly on Tuesday. This will cause sea levels will remain two to four feet above the normal high tide line and waves will push to the top of the beach. The worst conditions will be along south facing shores.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Western Arctic Coast
